events.title: Jared and Kathryn are working on getting Kathryn's name change
events.subtext: We are going to put Kent Hushion to work after the name change has completed.

events.title: Justin called Jared after honeymoon
events.subtext: Jared mentioned that there is no rush, but we will begin the process this summer

events.title: Justin and Kent chatted about getting some sweeeeeeet discounts on legal fees
Jared and Kathryn went on their HONEY moon
Jareds Wedding
events.subtext: Had a grand ol' time at the wedding!
